pro get_visit42_angle ; throw away program to check Niriss to fgs angle s=[[1.052966660,0.546825116,1.04640,0.559300],$ [-0.545313831,0.894839629,-0.555900,0.888300],$ [-0.986008788,-0.416011939,-0.981000,-0.427700],$ [-0.0479320861,-1.28261660,-0.0327000,-1.28310],$ [1.052966670,0.546825120,1.04640,0.559300],$ [-0.545313826,0.894839635,-0.555900,0.888300],$ [-0.986008790,-0.416011942,-0.981000,-0.427700]] xIdl=s[0,*] yIdl=s[1,*] sx=s[2,*] sy=s[3,*] forprint,xIDL,yIDL,sx,sy print,'----' a=findgen(20)*0.1-2 ra=a*!dtor VIdlParity=+1.0 xFGSRef=(yFGSRef=0.0) a=-1.250800+0.569986 ra=a*!dtor for i=0,n_elements(xIdl)-1 do begin xFGS = xFGSRef + (VIdlParity*xIdl[i] * cos(ra)) + (yIdl[i] * sin(ra)) yFGS = yFGSRef - (VIdlParity*xIdl[i] * sin(ra)) + (yIdl[i] * cos(ra)) print,xIdl[i],yIdl[i],xFGS,yFGS,sx[i],sy[i],xFGS-sx[i],yFGS-sy[i] endfor stop end
